mapper.select: SELECT SUM(ACNT_MN) AS MONEY FROM "ACCOUNT_DETAIL" JOIN ACCOUNTBOOK USING(ACNT_NO) WHERE ACNT_DATE IN (SELECT ACNT_DATE FROM "ACCOUNT_DETAIL" WHERE SUBSTR(ACNT_DATE, 7, 1) = #{month}) AND ACNT_NO = #{accountNo} AND MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND ACNT_ST = 'N'

SELECT ACNT_DATE, ACNT_CONT, ACNT_MN, ACNT_CATEGORY FROM ACCOUNT_DETAIL JOIN ACCOUNTBOOK USING(ACNT_NO) WHERE ACNT_DATE IN (SELECT ACNT_DATE FROM "ACCOUNT_DETAIL" WHERE SUBSTR(ACNT_DATE, 7, 1) = #{month}) AND ACNT_NO = #{accountNo} AND MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND ACNT_ST = 'N'

SELECT ACNT_CATEGORY , SUM(ACNT_MN)AS 합계, ROUND(RATIO_TO_REPORT(SUM(ACNT_MN)) OVER()*100,1) AS PERCENT FROM ACCOUNT_DETAIL JOIN ACCOUNTBOOK USING(ACNT_NO) WHERE ACNT_DATE IN (SELECT ACNT_DATE FROM "ACCOUNT_DETAIL" WHERE SUBSTR(ACNT_DATE, 7, 1) = #{month}) AND MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND ACNT_NO = #{accountNo} AND ACNT_ST = 'N' AND INOUT_NM = '지출' GROUP BY ACNT_CATEGORY ORDER BY 합계 DESC
